main.name: Glenn Pickett
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React and PHP
main.bio: Hi there! I am Glenn! I've been coding for over 10 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked as a freelancer to help build & scale small-medium companies. Along the journey I realized my passion existed in helping others gain and enhance their presence on the web. With this passion, I have now helped several business across the globe. Through continuous learning, I have accumulated several projects demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of scenarios. I deliver value by creating projects to help clients deliver their service.

education.degree: Fullstack React Web and Mobile Development

work.title: Freelance Developer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.
